Title: Software Engineering Intern
Description: Worked on a team of 3 to create a greenhouse pest-management mobile app.
Collaborated with stakeholders to ensure the app meets the necessary requirements.
Developed Angular UI pages and implemented .NET data-management services.
Designed database tables for Microsoft SQL Server.

Title: Teaching Assistant
Description: Assisted in the instruction and grading of computer science courses.
Utilized Java and C, to demonstrate data structures, algorithms, and designing a compiler.
Conducted weekly lab sessions, office hours, and developed supplementary material to support students.

Title: Supply Chain Leader
Description: Managed 12 mechanics in a fast-paced manufacturing plant that created over $2 million dollars worth of product daily.
Coordinated across departments to solve unexpected problems while maximizing run time.
Actively contributed to determining, planning, and executing equipment efficiency improvement projects.

Title: Supply Chain Intern
Description: Completed a water resource conservation project resulting in an annual savings of over 3 million gallons by optimizing the corn washing systems.
Additionally, I devised a comprehensive plan for the installation of digital flowmeters, streamlining future water conservation projects.

Title: Expediter, Cook, Dishwasher
Description:
I began my career in high school as a dishwasher, quickly adapting to the fast-paced kitchen environment and demonstrating my ability to learn and take on new responsibilities.
I progressed to prep cook, then line cook and eventually expediter, the lead of the kitchen.
